name: M.U.T.T.
description:
Created for the ScoreSpace Jam #24 in under 72 hours with the theme "Evolve"

Uh-oh, looks like it's time to take Experiment K-9 on a walk again. He's a little aggressive. Try not to let him eat people or he'll mutate and destroy the city

Move - WASD

Goal - Get as far as possible without letting your dog eat too many people and mutate out of control

Music:

press A to not die by tiyumusic - www.newgrounds.com/audio/listen/1183636

Echo Blues Effect by Anonymous420 -https://freemusicarchive.org/music/Anonymous420/Nostalgia/Anonymous420_-_Nostalg...
